EXT_DESCRIPTION.message: Save your current session, including windows, their positions, tabs, and tab groups.

ONBOARDING_STEP_1.message: Open the extension popup by clicking on the icon in the extensions tray.

ONBOARDING_STEP_2.message: Click the Save Session button or use the shortcut at any time to save your current session.

ONBOARDING_STEP_3.message: Click on your saved session whenever you want to restore it. All windows, tabs and tab groups will be restored exactly how you left them.

ONBOARDING_DONATE.message: Gifts are entirely optional but they do help me to continue creating free extensions. Thanks for your generosity!
